# probounds.calculate_bounds_observed { #probounds.probounds.calculate_bounds_observed }

```python
probounds.calculate_bounds_observed(df_observed)
```

Calculate bounds directly from observational data.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type      | Description                                                       | Default    |
|-------------|-----------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| df_observed | FrameLike | Observational dataset containing ``trt`` and ``outcome`` columns. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type               | Description                                                          |
|--------|--------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | dict\[str, float\] | Lower and upper bounds of the benefit for the observational dataset. |
